title: Perform Rig Acceptance Test
description: Before starting a long-term contract, a drilling supervisor performs an acceptance test on a drilling rig to ensure all equipment meets specifications.

tasks.description: Load the digital rig acceptance checklist, which contains hundreds of items to verify.
tasks.expected_outcome: The official checklist is loaded on a tablet.

tasks.description: Go through the checklist, inspecting equipment (e.g., top drive, mud pumps, BOP) and verifying certifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: The checklist is completed, with most items passing but a few deficiencies noted (e.g., expired sling).

tasks.description: Generate a punch list of the deficient items and send it to the drilling contractor to be rectified before the rig can go on hire.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal punch list is created and sent to the contractor, and the items are tracked for closure.
